summary: Interactive journey app with two video segments, rest points, issue resolution, and checkpoint celebration with campfire ending
architectural_notes: Two-video structure with interactive click-through progression
Campfire celebration positioned as final destination after night sequence

existing_features.title: Modify the journey flow to use exactly two videos: the first video plays at journey start and leads to a rest point/break point, the second video plays after continuing from the rest point and leads to the halt issue
After resolving the halt issue, display the night road static image (existing golden hour/night scene), then clicking anywhere shows the destination arrived screen with the campfire image
Remove any intermediate travel videos or scenes between the rest point and the halt issue to ensure only two videos are used in the entire flow
Update the flow state machine in useRVFlow hook to support the new sequence: start → video 1 → rest point → video 2 → issue → night image → campfire destination → completion
Ensure the campfire destination screen is the final celebration screen before trip completion, displaying the campfire image from the assets

new_feature_requests.summary: Restructure app flow: campfire image at end after issue resolution and night road sequence
Limit to two videos: first video leads to rest point, second video (after rest) leads to issue
Sequence after second video: issue appears → resolve → night road image → click anywhere → checkpoint 1 destination with campfire
